text: Kalikho Pul (20 July 1969 â€“ 9 August 2016Kalikho Pul, Removed As Arunachal Chief Minister Weeks Ago, Found Hanging) was an Indian politician. He was Chief Minister of the north-eastern state of Arunachal Pradesh in India for a short-time in 2016. On 9 August 2016, Pul allegedly committed suicide by hanging at his official residence in Itanagar. Pul's supporters protested in Itanagar demanding an investigation by the Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI). ==References== Category:1969 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Indian politicians Category:Articles lacking sources Category:People from Arunachal Pradesh
title: Kalikho Pul
